description: At the pool hall downtown, late night, Jin Powers and Krave Moore have a score to settle. Some passionate kissing leads Jin to slurp on Krave's pulsating erection for a while, just before he licks all around Krave's tender hole. Watch these billiard bosses have their way with each other as they decide who deserves to be called the master of the hall.</br></br>Enjoy!
series: NDE - E161 - Jin Powers & Krave Moore
title: Calling The Pocket
